item.title: Mastering the Art of Public Speaking: Captivate Your Audience from the Start by Explaining “the Why”
item.description: With over 30 years of public speaking experience, the emphasis is on sharing insights to captivate audiences and equip them with coding skills. The importance of "Explain the Why" is highlighted, as neglecting this can lead to audience disengagement. Practical tips for crafting a compelling "why" statement are provided to create an engaging introduction. Link to article: https://dotnettips.wordpress.com/2024/08/04/mastering-the-art-of-public-speaking-captivate-your-audience-from-the-start-by-explaining-the-why/
